Welcome.title: Welcome To VideoWiki
Welcome.info1: Consider the tool as a "Video Wikipedia

About.title: About Us
About.info1: A collaborative platform for learners and educators to secure learning continuity in times of restrictions and beyond.
About.info2: A simple tool for teachers to create teaching content without any advance knowledge of a tool or code. They create by using various media and graphics from the open stock libraries and merging it with their own content to keep it engaging and diverse.

Problem.info1: In the education system, more than 90% of students are impacted by school and university closures. The map is a depiction of countries that are experiencing lockdown in terms of a countrywide or a localized lockdown. The education sector and an estimated 1.5 billion students were affected worldwide due to these lockdowns. Learning has been disrupted due to the pandemic, and there is a requirement for a new education model.
Problem.info2: Solution: Online and immersive digitalization of Content, Curriculum, Coaching, and Classroom.
Problem.card1p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.
Problem.card2p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.
Problem.card3p: Open Enterprise supports best in sociocratic management.

Inspiration.info1: Theoretical knowledge online is what most universities have achieved, but practical training online so far seems unique. We are building tools to auto-generate (convert) text-based content to video-based online content with an extension towards gamification and immersive techniques for advanced pieces of training.
Inspiration.info2: Vision to ensure learning continuity for all.
Inspiration.info3: Standardized education and access to all with equal opportunities to educational processes.

Project.info: The importance of education is highlighted in SDG 4 (“Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all”). This goal encompasses various dimensions that are critical to supporting young workers’ transition.

item1.title: Enable Learning
item1.description: Content platform for semi-automated content creation.

item2.title: Enable Conversations
item2.description: Add sharing, feedback and communication options.

item3.title: Engagement with extensions
item3.description: Adding gamification capabilities with new sensors for advances sciences.

item4.title: Standarize curriculums
item4.description: Bring the global learning at a relatively more standarized norm.

item5.title: Reduce inequalities
item5.description: Reduce global inequalities on access to education and qualification gaps.

item6.title: Immersive ecosystem
item6.description: One world education and immersive with equal opportunities for all.

Steps: Digital Automated Content Platform that teachers use to create engaging learning content using the Video Creation tool
Students get the digital lectures, courses for self-paced, yet guided virtual coaching
Anyone can clone content and create more learning material from previous creators
Public knowledge is free, you only pay for private. The private revenues are shared back to free contributors
You’re all good to start learning
